data.oai_dc:dc: Authoritative species list, Freshwater, Annelida, Oligochaeta, Faunistic regions|Biological Classification|Biota|Checklist|Inventorythematic

The Freshwater Animal Diversity Assessment (FADA) database contains authoritative species lists for several taxonomic groups and distribution data at the level of faunistic regions. This dataset contains the Nematomorpha checklist "Martin, P., Martinez-Ansemil E., Pinder, A., Timm T. and Wetzel, M.J., 2016 December 15, World checklist of freshwater Oligochaeta species. World Wide Web electronic publication. Available online at http://fada.biodiversity.be/group/show/12 ".|Provide taxonomic checklists specific for freshwater.
